original: de yang 'od ces pa'i thig le phye nas bde ba'i thig le rtog pa la sogs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba ni dga' ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de yang 'od ces pa'i thig le phye nas bde ba'i thig le rtog pa la sogs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba ni dga' ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: Moreover, the ‚Äúlight‚Äù is the drop that is divided, and the drop of bliss that is free from all stains of conceptuality and so on is the result of all joys.

original: shar ba zhes pa mchog gi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: shar ba zhes pa mchog gi dga' ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArising‚Äù is supreme joy.

original: nub pa ni chad pa ste mun pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nub pa ni chad pa ste mun pa lta bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSetting‚Äù is cessation, like darkness.

original: de ni spong ba'o //
analyzed: de ni spong ba'o //
translated: That is abandoned.

original: 'pho ba ni mchog gi dga' ba'i gnas la sogs pa ni longs mi spyod par rlag pa'o //üîΩdus zhes pa ni 'das pa'i dus kyang ma yin /üîΩma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma yin /
analyzed: 'pho ba ni mchog gi dga' ba'i gnas la sogs pa ni longs mi spyod par rlag pa'o // dus zhes pa ni 'das pa'i dus kyang ma yin / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma yin /
translated: ‚ÄúTransference‚Äù is the destruction of the place of supreme joy, and so on, without enjoying it.üîΩ‚ÄúTime‚Äù is not the past time,üîΩnor is it the future time.

original: da ltar zhes kyang dmigs su med ba'i dus te /
analyzed: da ltar zhes kyang dmigs su med ba'i dus te /
translated: ‚ÄúNow‚Äù is also not observed.

original: de lta bu'i dus su me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgyas pa'i dus so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dus su me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgyas pa'i dus so //
translated: At such a time, it is the time of the blossoming of flowers, fruits, and so forth.

original: de yang rlung phyir rgyu ba dang / nang du rgyu ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rlung phyir rgyu ba dang / nang du rgyu ba med pa'o //
translated: Moreover, there is no external or internal movement of the wind.

original: de'ang rgyud las /üîΩshin tu rgyu ba'i dus dang ni //
analyzed: de'ang rgyud las / shin tu rgyu ba'i dus dang ni //
translated: The Tantra says:üîΩThe time of very much movement

original: shin tu min pa dus gnyis te //
analyzed: shin tu min pa dus gnyis te //
translated: and the time of not very much

original: sna yi bu ga gnyis ka yi'o //
analyzed: sna yi bu ga gnyis ka yi'o //
translated: are the two nostrils.

original: gnyis ka min pa de nyid ni //
analyzed: gnyis ka min pa de nyid ni //
translated: Not both is the reality.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod @166b ba ni rtsa'i dbyibs padma'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yod pa de 'dod pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs dang / dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod @166b ba ni rtsa'i dbyibs padma'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yod pa de 'dod pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs dang / dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu'o //
translated: The lotus fruit is the shape of the channel that resembles a lotus fruit. The desire for that is the cause of the arising of various kinds of bliss and so forth, and the method of union.

original: de yang las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa la brten pa la 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de yang las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa la brten pa la 'byung ngo //
translated: Moreover, it arises in dependence on an action seal and so forth.

original: lus 'dar zhas pa ni de las byung nas 'dar ba'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i shes rab mas rgyu byas nas 'byung ba dang brten pa 'dar bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: lus 'dar zhas pa ni de las byung nas 'dar ba'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i shes rab mas rgyu byas nas 'byung ba dang brten pa 'dar bar byas pa'o //
translated: The body trembles means that having arisen from that, the trembling bliss and so forth arise by the mother's wisdom, and the body and support tremble.

original: nyes ba zhes bya ba'i rlung dang ldan nas /
analyzed: nyes ba zhes bya ba'i rlung dang ldan nas /
translated: Endowed with the wind called ‚Äúfault,‚Äù

original: stobs zhes bya ba'i thig ler gnas pas 'bras bu smin no //
analyzed: stobs zhes bya ba'i thig ler gnas pas 'bras bu smin no //
translated: it abides in the bindu called ‚Äústrength,‚Äù and the fruit ripens.

original: drag po'i ming ni rtsa'i dbyibs ru dr'aksha bzhin gnas pa la bya'o //
analyzed: drag po'i ming ni rtsa'i dbyibs ru dr'aksha bzhin gnas pa la bya'o //
translated: The name ‚Äúfierce‚Äù refers to the shape of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, which is like a rudrƒÅk·π£a.

original: des ni drag po'i mig mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: des ni drag po'i mig mtshon pa'o //
translated: That indicates the ‚Äúfierce eye.‚Äù

original: 'gro ba / zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi gnas ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba / zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi gnas ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúMoving‚Äù refers to the nonabiding bodhicitta.

original: dga' ba'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: dga' ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: It is a synonym for ‚Äújoy.‚Äù

original: mnyam pa zhes pa ni me dang mnyam pa'i rlung gi ming ngo //
analyzed: mnyam pa zhes pa ni me dang mnyam pa'i rlung gi ming ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúEqual‚Äù is the name of the wind that is equal to fire.

original: ldan zhes pa ni dga' ba dang rlung du ldan pa ste /
analyzed: ldan zhes pa ni dga' ba dang rlung du ldan pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed‚Äù means endowed with joy and wind.

original: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan no //
translated: It is endowed with all, such as bodhicitta.

original: sprin zhes pa ni bde ba'i thig le'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs de'i dus su thams cad dang ldan no //
analyzed: sprin zhes pa ni bde ba'i thig le'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs de'i dus su thams cad dang ldan no //
translated: ‚ÄúCloud‚Äù is a synonym for the bindu of bliss. At that time, it is endowed with all.

original: rigs kyi me tog ces pa la sogs pa ni bla ma las rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi me tog ces pa la sogs pa ni bla ma las rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe flower of the family‚Äù and so on are to be understood from the guru.

original: thog ni sngangs 'jigs byed pa ste //
analyzed: thog ni sngangs 'jigs byed pa ste //
translated: The lightning is terrifying.

original: zhes pa ni thog babs sam brgyab kyang bred pa bzhin /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thog babs sam brgyab kyang bred pa bzhin /
translated: This is like being frightened by a thunderbolt that has fallen or been thrown.üîΩThe naturally spontaneous is the supreme of all joys, free from all conceptual elaboration.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dga' ba thams cad kyi thog tu gyur pa dang / gzhan yang thog ces pa rang bzhin dga' ba'i rnam grangs su brtags pa des chad pa'i dga' ba la sogs pa rnams 'jigs shing bred par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dga' ba thams cad kyi thog tu gyur pa dang / gzhan yang thog ces pa rang bzhin dga' ba'i rnam grangs su brtags pa des chad pa'i dga' ba la sogs pa rnams 'jigs shing bred par byed pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the term ‚Äúthunderbolt‚Äù is a synonym for the naturally spontaneous, and it frightens and terrifies all joys that are subject to cessation.

original: 'o na rang bzhin dga' ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rang bzhin dga' ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the naturally spontaneous like?

original: dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam pa dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam pa dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: It is not the same as all joys, and it is not a thing.

original: rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang gsungs te /üîΩrang bzhin dga' ba dngos po men //
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang gsungs te / rang bzhin dga' ba dngos po men //
translated: The Later Tantra of the Secret Nucleus also states:üîΩThe naturally spontaneous is not a thing.

original: dngos bo ma yin pa yang min //
analyzed: dngos bo ma yin pa yang min //
translated: It is not a non-thing.

original: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
analyzed: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
translated: It is neither samsara nor nirvana.

original: char yar thig le tshul ma yin //
analyzed: char yar thig le tshul ma yin //
translated: It is not the mode of the bindu.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: snying po'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: snying po'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The Tantra of the Secret Nucleus also states:

original: rlag dang longs spyod la sogs bral //
analyzed: rlag dang longs spyod la sogs bral //
translated: It is free from destruction, enjoyment and so forth.

original: dga' ba rnams kyis brjod mi nus //
analyzed: dga' ba rnams kyis brjod mi nus //
translated: It cannot be described by the joys.

original: thig le la sogs 'joms pa'i lha //
analyzed: thig le la sogs 'joms pa'i lha //
translated: The god who destroys the bindu, etc.

original: de nyid rang bzhin ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin ye shes so //
translated: is the nature of reality, intuition.

original: de bas na mtshan mar snang ba'i ye shes thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mtshan mar snang ba'i ye shes thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, intuition appearing as signs is not common to all.

original: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
analyzed: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
translated: Therein, the sixteen are the setting.

original: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi @167a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi @167a * //
translated: This is said of the non-clarity of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: gsal ba la ni bcu drug yin bya'o //
analyzed: gsal ba la ni bcu drug yin bya'o //
translated: The sixteen are the setting.

original: shar dang nub pa gang la lar zhes pa ni longs spyod dang rlag pa la sogs pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba zhes mi bya'o //
analyzed: shar dang nub pa gang la lar zhes pa ni longs spyod dang rlag pa la sogs pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba zhes mi bya'o //
translated: The setting of enjoyment, destruction, etc. is not called natural joy.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / rang bzhin dga' ba de yod min //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / rang bzhin dga' ba de yod min // zhes gsungs te /
translated: that natural joy does not exist.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba la ni shar dang nub pa'i dngos po longs spyod la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i ye shes med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba la ni shar dang nub pa'i dngos po longs spyod la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i ye shes med pa'o //
translated: In natural joy, there is no intuition of signs such as enjoyment, setting, and destruction.

original: yon po'i gdung bu zhes pa ni la la n'a g-yon phyogs na lu gu rgyud bzhin gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yon po'i gdung bu zhes pa ni la la n'a g-yon phyogs na lu gu rgyud bzhin gnas pa'o //
translated: The crooked flute is the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ on the left side, which is located like a chain.

original: rtsa ba'i lte ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni srog ma'i lte ba'i mdud pa re rer byang chub kyi sems thigs pa re re la dga' ba dang char yang tshul la sogs pa 'pho ba dang skye ba dang gnas pa'i tshe shar dang nub dang dus la
analyzed: rtsa ba'i lte ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni srog ma'i lte ba'i mdud pa re rer byang chub kyi sems thigs pa re re la dga' ba dang char yang tshul la sogs pa 'pho ba dang skye ba dang gnas pa'i tshe shar dang nub dang dus la
translated: The navel and so forth are the knots of the life-channel, and in each knot there is a drop of bodhicitta, which is the essence of the four joys, and so forth.

original: sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: At the time of the arising, abiding, and falling of the joys, they are applied to the east, west, and so forth.

original: de lta'i bde chen rnams ni zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kun rdzob tu dbye ba la ni rnam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta'i bde chen rnams ni zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kun rdzob tu dbye ba la ni rnam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The great joys and so forth are the nature of the previously explained great bliss.

original: 'pho bru ni bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: 'pho bru ni bdag gis bshad //
translated: The transferences are explained by me.

original: ces pa ni 'pho ba bcu drug tu sngar bdag gis bshad de /
analyzed: ces pa ni 'pho ba bcu drug tu sngar bdag gis bshad de /
translated: The sixteen transferences were previously explained by me.

original: ston pas bshad zin pa'o //
analyzed: ston pas bshad zin pa'o //
translated: They were explained by the teacher.

original: de ltar bshad nas bsdus pa 'di nas mar phye nas bstan to //üîΩdngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: de ltar bshad nas bsdus pa 'di nas mar phye nas bstan to // dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
translated: Having explained them in that way, they are summarized and taught from here on.

original: ces pa la sogs par dngos ni las kyi phyag rgya'i lta ba la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs par dngos ni las kyi phyag rgya'i lta ba la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
translated: The actual, basis, and distinctions and so forth are the thirty-two methods of union with the karma consort, such as the view, and so on.

original: dga' ba dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //üîΩyang na dngos po ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas byang chub kyi sems rtsa de rnams mdud par brten pa dang mchog gi dga' ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'o // yang na dngos po ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas byang chub kyi sems rtsa de rnams mdud par brten pa dang mchog gi dga' ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The things are the commitment seal, the bodhicitta element, and the binding of the channels, the supreme joy, the dharmacakra, and so on.

original: yang rten gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rang gi bde ba'i rten byang chub kyi sems thig le la brten par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang rten gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rang gi bde ba'i rten byang chub kyi sems thig le la brten par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, the things are the support of the gnosis seal, the bodhicitta element, which is the support of one‚Äôs bliss, and the bindu.

original: ye shes ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya rang gis rig cing rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya rang gis rig cing rtogs pa ste /
translated: Gnosis is the gnosis seal, which is known and realized by oneself.

original: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gnyis las byung bar rig pa'am chad pa'i dga' ba dang longs spyod 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gnyis las byung bar rig pa'am chad pa'i dga' ba dang longs spyod 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is known as the gnosis that arises from the two, the utterly pure bodhicitta and the relative bodhicitta, or the joy of the continuum and the enjoyment cakra, and so on.

original: yang na ye shes ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rig pa'i byang chub kyi sems su shes pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ye shes ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rig pa'i byang chub kyi sems su shes pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, gnosis is the gnosis of the nature of phenomena, which is known as the bodhicitta of awareness.

original: rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rig pa dang bral bar phye nas rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rig pa dang bral bar phye nas rtogs pa'am /
translated: The term distinction means that the nature of phenomena is distinguished from the nature of great bliss, which is free from awareness.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba dang / bde chen 'khor lo @167b la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba dang / bde chen 'khor lo @167b la sogs pa'o //
translated: The analysis is the realization that the nature of phenomena is separated from the nature of great bliss by the seal of the nature of phenomena.

original: yang na rnam par 'byed pa ni phyag rgya thams cad dang bral ba byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin phye nas ye shes kyi gzhi dang bcas pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rnam par 'byed pa ni phyag rgya thams cad dang bral ba byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin phye nas ye shes kyi gzhi dang bcas pa spangs pa'o //
translated: Or else, the analysis is the separation of the nature of the bodhicitta from all seals, and the abandonment of the basis of gnosis.

original: de ltar bsdus pa'i phye ba bstan nas rgyas pa'i phye ba bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsdus pa'i phye ba bstan nas rgyas pa'i phye ba bshad par bya'o //
translated: Having thus taught the analysis of the summary, now the analysis of the extensive [version] will be explained.

original: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin //
analyzed: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin //
translated: The view is the equality of things.

original: zhes ba ni thabs dang shes rab srub dang bsrubs pa las ni ye shes kyi ro'i rtags mnyam par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes ba ni thabs dang shes rab srub dang bsrubs pa las ni ye shes kyi ro'i rtags mnyam par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The equality of the sign of the taste of gnosis arises from the churning of method and wisdom.

original: 'dod chags pa ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la chags shing zhen pas ni 'khor ba'i 'bras bu thob ste bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis ni yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags pa ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la chags shing zhen pas ni 'khor ba'i 'bras bu thob ste bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis ni yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Attachment to the five sense objects such as form, sound, smell, taste, and touch, and clinging to them, results in the attainment of samsaric fruits.

original: des 'bras bu gzugs kyi sku 'byung bas ni tha mal ba'i bag chags dag par byed do //
analyzed: des 'bras bu gzugs kyi sku 'byung bas ni tha mal ba'i bag chags dag par byed do //
translated: The various stages such as the creation stage purify the habitual tendencies of ordinariness.

original: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa'i zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab 'dus pas reg bya'i bde ba nyams su myong ba 'dis rtogs pa la sogs pa dag par byed do //
analyzed: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa'i zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab 'dus pas reg bya'i bde ba nyams su myong ba 'dis rtogs pa la sogs pa dag par byed do //
translated: The ‚Äúcontact‚Äù that is the union of the two is the experience of the bliss of contact. This purifies the habitual tendencies of conceptualization and so on.

original: dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
analyzed: dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
translated: The ‚Äúactual‚Äù purifies the habitual tendencies of the three realms.

original: ces pa la sogs pa ni khams gsum gyi bag chags bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa rnams ni dngos kyis med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ni khams gsum gyi bag chags bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa rnams ni dngos kyis med par byed pa'o //
translated: The habitual tendencies of the three realms, good, bad, and so on, are generated by karma and affliction. The ‚Äúactual‚Äù purifies those.

original: gzhan yang sbyor thabs sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod 'o bya ba dang ; sen mos gdab pa dang / nu ma mnye ba dang / 'khyud pa la sogs longs spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyor thabs sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod 'o bya ba dang ; sen mos gdab pa dang / nu ma mnye ba dang / 'khyud pa la sogs longs spyod do //
translated: Moreover, one enjoys the various methods of union, such as kissing, scratching with the fingernails, fondling the breasts, embracing, and so on.

original: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad ni dngos kyi bar du gcod par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad ni dngos kyi bar du gcod par byed do //
translated: Thus, all phenomena of subject and object are interrupted by the real thing.

original: punda ra'i ka 'byung ba yis //
analyzed: punda ra'i ka 'byung ba yis //
translated: The arising of the pu·πá·∏çarƒ´ka

original: zhes pa ni me tog dkar po'i kha dog gi sems dkar pos byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i kha dog dpes mtshon nas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni me tog dkar po'i kha dog gi sems dkar pos byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i kha dog dpes mtshon nas /
translated: The white color of the flower illustrates the white bodhicitta with a white mind.

original: rtsa'i mdud par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rtsa'i mdud par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: It arises in the knots of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: zur gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni zur gsum dang padma'i 'bras bu dang drag po'i mig 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'i rten byed pa'o //
analyzed: zur gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni zur gsum dang padma'i 'bras bu dang drag po'i mig 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'i rten byed pa'o //
translated: The three corners, and so on, refer to the thirty-two knots that are like the corners of a triangle, the shape of a lotus fruit, the shape of ≈öiva‚Äôs eye, and so on.

original: brten pa yin zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rten ni rtsa rnams kyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: brten pa yin zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rten ni rtsa rnams kyis byed pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe support‚Äù means that the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s support the bodhicitta.

original: brten pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: brten pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The supported is the absence of meditative concentration.

original: de la sgom pa po med rnal 'byor pa dang sgom rgyu gnyis dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: de la sgom pa po med rnal 'byor pa dang sgom rgyu gnyis dang bral ba ste /
translated: The meditator is absent, free from the duality of meditator and meditation object.

original: de bas chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de bas chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the dharmadhatu is free from conceptual elaborations.

original: steng dang 'og @168a * //
analyzed: steng dang 'og @168a * //
translated: The support of the equalizing of above and below, and so on, is the support of the great bliss am·πõta.üîΩAll the winds, such as the upward-moving wind, and so on, gather into one.

original: gi mnyam pa'i rten zhes pa la sogs pa ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa dang / 'dus pa'i dus nas ye shes tsam du yang rtogs pa'am gnas pa med do //
analyzed: gi mnyam pa'i rten zhes pa la sogs pa ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa dang / 'dus pa'i dus nas ye shes tsam du yang rtogs pa'am gnas pa med do //
translated: From the time of their gathering, there is no realization or abiding even as mere gnosis.

original: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten ni shin tu bde ba'i rang bzhin de ni nyon mongs la sogs pa'i rtsi ru gyur pa'i rten no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten ni shin tu bde ba'i rang bzhin de ni nyon mongs la sogs pa'i rtsi ru gyur pa'i rten no //
translated: The support of the great bliss am·πõta is the nature of supreme bliss. That is the support of the elixir of the afflictions, and so on.

original: rigs lnga'i ni mchog gi gzhi ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga'i gzhi ni nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i ni mchog gi gzhi ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga'i gzhi ni nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The supreme basis of the five families is the basis of the five aggregates, such as the form aggregate, and so on.

original: yang na 'khor lo lnga ni rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: yang na 'khor lo lnga ni rigs lnga'o //
translated: Alternatively, the five cakras are the five families.

original: de rnams kyi mchog gi gzhi ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo yin te rigs drug pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog gi gzhi ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo yin te rigs drug pa'i 'o //
translated: The supreme basis of those is the wheel of great bliss, which is the sixth class.

original: de bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las zhes par bshad do //üîΩye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: de bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las zhes par bshad do // ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
translated: It is explained as ‚Äúthe churning of white bliss.‚ÄùüîΩSpontaneous gnosis

original: ces pa ni dga' ba thams cad chad pa'i dga' bas bsdu'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni dga' ba thams cad chad pa'i dga' bas bsdu'o //
translated: is included in the joy that is the cessation of all joy.

original: 'o na rang bzhin dga' bas kyang bsdu'am zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rang bzhin dga' bas kyang bsdu'am zhe na /
translated: Well then, is it also included in natural joy?

original: rang bzhin dga' bas ni bsdus kyang mi 'gal te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' bas ni bsdus kyang mi 'gal te /
translated: It is not contradictory that it is included in natural joy.

original: chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang bzhin dga' ba mi rnyed do //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang bzhin dga' ba mi rnyed do //
translated: Natural joy is not found without relying on the joy that is the cessation of joy.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba ni dga' ba gsum las logs na med pas kyang mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba ni dga' ba gsum las logs na med pas kyang mi 'gal lo //
translated: Natural joy is not separate from the three joys, so it is not contradictory.

original: dper na lus med par yang sems mi rnyed pa ltar chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang bzhin dga' ba mi thob bo //
analyzed: dper na lus med par yang sems mi rnyed pa ltar chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang bzhin dga' ba mi thob bo //
translated: For example, just as the mind is not found without a body, natural joy is not attained without relying on the joy that is the cessation of joy.

original: de bzhin du ma yin na skyon yod pas 'di skad kyang gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma yin na skyon yod pas 'di skad kyang gsungs te /
translated: If it were not so, there would be a fault. Therefore it is also said:

original: dmigs pa la ni brten nas su //
analyzed: dmigs pa la ni brten nas su //
translated: Relying on an object,

original: mi dmigs pa ni rab tu tshol //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni rab tu tshol //
translated: nonobservation is sought.

original: zhes pa dang / dper na me tog dang dri bzhin no zhes pa'i dpe 'di rnams kyis bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / dper na me tog dang dri bzhin no zhes pa'i dpe 'di rnams kyis bstan to //
translated: These examples illustrate it.

original: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga' ;
analyzed: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga' ;
translated: The supreme joy of trembling is joy.

original: / zhes pa la sogs pa'i mchog gi dga' ba de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas ye shes nyams su myong la /
analyzed: / zhes pa la sogs pa'i mchog gi dga' ba de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas ye shes nyams su myong la /
translated: Thus, the supreme joy is experienced through wisdom with conceptual thought.

original: de ltar myong ba'i don la bde bar gnas tsam na sems rtse gcig tu mi g-yeng bar gnas pa las rang bzhin dga' ba 'grub pa ma rnyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar myong ba'i don la bde bar gnas tsam na sems rtse gcig tu mi g-yeng bar gnas pa las rang bzhin dga' ba 'grub pa ma rnyed par 'gyur /
translated: When one abides in the mere bliss of such experience, the natural joy is accomplished without finding the mind abiding one-pointedly without distraction.

original: de'i skabs su chags pa la sogs pa'i ye shes thams cad dang bral ba'i don ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de'i skabs su chags pa la sogs pa'i ye shes thams cad dang bral ba'i don ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
translated: At that time, the meaning of being free from all wisdoms such as attachment is natural joy.

original: chags pa dang bcas pa'i chad dga' ston to //
analyzed: chags pa dang bcas pa'i chad dga' ston to //
translated: Joy with attachment is taught.

original: gzhi med pa yi rang bzhin dga' //
analyzed: gzhi med pa yi rang bzhin dga' //
translated: Natural joy is without a basis.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i chad pa'i dga' //
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i chad pa'i dga' //
translated: Joy with a basis is with attachment.

original: zhes so // ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
analyzed: zhes so // ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
translated: Wisdom is made free of pride.

original: @168b ces pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs pas 'grub po //
analyzed: @168b ces pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs pas 'grub po //
translated: This is the accomplishment by abandoning the pride that thinks, ‚ÄúThis is the perfect limit.‚Äù

original: chos thams cad ni rnam par shes //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rnam par shes //
translated: All phenomena are consciousness.

original: zhes pa ni phyis bsdus pa'i chos dang nang gis bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyis bsdus pa'i chos dang nang gis bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa shes pa'o //
translated: This is the knowledge of all phenomena included in the later compilations and all phenomena included internally.

original: ye shes shes bya don grub byed //
analyzed: ye shes shes bya don grub byed //
translated: Wisdom accomplishes the goal of the object of knowledge.

original: ces pa ni thun mong gi dngos grub la sogs pa kun gyi don grub pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni thun mong gi dngos grub la sogs pa kun gyi don grub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the goal of all common accomplishments and so on.

original: rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags //
translated: The light of fame of the analysis is form.

original: zhes pa ni byang chub sems 'byed pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'od rab de ni brjod pas mi phog go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub sems 'byed pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'od rab de ni brjod pas mi phog go //
translated: This is the light of the analysis of the bodhicitta, free from all proliferation. That light is not struck by expression.

original: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
analyzed: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
translated: The cloud of method is the nature of power.

original: ces pa ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi bdag nyid yin pas na rnam par 'byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi bdag nyid yin pas na rnam par 'byed ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the sixteen joys of bliss, it is called ‚Äúanalysis.‚Äù

original: dngos po kun du ni dngos por snang ba thams cad do //
analyzed: dngos po kun du ni dngos por snang ba thams cad do //
translated: All things are all appearances of things.

original: rnam pa bzhi dang bcas pa rlag ni de rnams ma lus pa dang / bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad rlag par zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi dang bcas pa rlag ni de rnams ma lus pa dang / bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad rlag par zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of destroy all four is to destroy all of them without exception, along with their habitual tendencies.üîΩ The magic of birth and abiding

original: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
analyzed: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
translated: The magic of birth is the display of birth, and the magic of abiding is the display of abiding.üîΩ The magic of cessation is the display of cessation.üîΩThe magic of transformation is the display of transformation.üîΩ The magic of manifestation is the display of manifestation.üîΩThe magic of disappearance is the display of disappearance.üîΩ The magic of manifestation and disappearance is the display of manifestation and disappearance.üîΩThe magic of the body is the display of the body.

original: zhes pa ni skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa dang / 'gag pa dang / gnas pa la sogs pa yang yon tan no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa dang / 'gag pa dang / gnas pa la sogs pa yang yon tan no //
translated: The magic of speech is the display of speech.

original: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug sod //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug sod //
translated: The magic of mind is the display of mind.üîΩ The magic of the body, speech, and mind is the display of the body, speech, and mind.üîΩThe magic of the elements is the display of the elements.üîΩ The magic of the sense bases is the display of the sense bases.üîΩThe magic of the aggregates is the display of the aggregates.

original: ces pa ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ni de rnams dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ni de rnams dang bral ba'o //
translated: The magic of the afflictions is the display of the afflictions.üîΩThe magic of the path is the display of the path.üîΩ The magic of the result is the display of the result.üîΩThe magic of the view is the display of the view.üîΩ The magic of meditation is the display of meditation.üîΩThe magic of conduct is the display of conduct.üîΩ The magic of fruition is the display of fruition.üîΩThe magic of the body is the display of the body.

original: rtsi'i snying po thams cad ni zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te /
analyzed: rtsi'i snying po thams cad ni zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te /
translated: The magic of speech is the display of speech.

original: de rnams kyi snying po 'khor lo byang chub kyi sems dang bcas ba rtsa'o //üîΩ'od 'di yang zad de med par byed do //üîΩ'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po 'khor lo byang chub kyi sems dang bcas ba rtsa'o // 'od 'di yang zad de med par byed do // 'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
translated: The magic of mind is the display of mind.üîΩ The magic of the body, speech, and mind is the display of the body, speech, and mind.üîΩThe magic of the elements is the display of the elements.üîΩ The magic of the sense bases is the display of the sense bases.

original: zhes ba ni dkyil 'khor dang / 'khor lo dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang / las la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes ba ni dkyil 'khor dang / 'khor lo dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang / las la sogs pa'o //
translated: The magic of the aggregates is the display of the aggregates.üîΩ The magic of the afflictions is the display of the afflictions.üîΩThe magic of the path is the display of the path.üîΩ The magic of the result is the display of

original: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed ;
analyzed: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed ;
translated: That which destroys is the analysis.

original: / ces ba ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i chos thams cad do //
analyzed: / ces ba ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i chos thams cad do //
translated: This refers to all the phenomena explained previously, such as the mandala.

original: bcom pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pas ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: bcom pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pas ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The phrase in order to destroy and so forth is easy to understand and so is not explained.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la //
translated: In all the buddhas and bodhisattvas,

original: zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig gi sangs rgyas la sogs par /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig gi sangs rgyas la sogs par /
translated: this refers to the buddhas of the eleventh stage and so forth.

original: sa bcu man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are on the tenth stage and below.

original: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: It always resides in the heart.

original: zhes pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba kun gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba kun gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of the bodhicitta of all innate joys.

original: yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
translated: Again, buddhas and so forth refer to the five aggregates and so forth.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun ni dbang po la sogs pa'i skye @169a * //üîΩmched rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun ni dbang po la sogs pa'i skye @169a * // mched rnams so //
translated: The all bodhisattvas are the sense bases such as the eyes and so forth.

original: snying gar de'i snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la byang chub sems kyi sa bon zla ba ltar kun rdzob kyi dngos por bzhugs so //
analyzed: snying gar de'i snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la byang chub sems kyi sa bon zla ba ltar kun rdzob kyi dngos por bzhugs so //
translated: In the heart, in the center of the lotus of the heart, the seed syllable of bodhicitta resides like a moon, existing as a conventional entity.

original: rnam par 'byed ba bsgoms pa med //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed ba bsgoms pa med //
translated: There is no meditation on analysis.

original: ces pa ni chos nyid yang dag par de nyid cir yang bsgom du med do //
analyzed: ces pa ni chos nyid yang dag par de nyid cir yang bsgom du med do //
translated: This means that the nature of reality, just as it is, cannot be meditated on in any way.

original: phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
analyzed: phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
translated: Free from the aggregates, elements, and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni phung po lnga dang khams bco brgyad dang skye mched la sogs pa'i 'dus byas thams cad dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phung po lnga dang khams bco brgyad dang skye mched la sogs pa'i 'dus byas thams cad dang bral ba'o //
translated: This means that it is free from all conditioned phenomena, such as the five aggregates, the eighteen elements, and the twelve sense bases.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
translated: Empty of phenomena such as sound and so forth.

original: zhes ba ni sgra dang tshad ma la sogs pa'i chos kun gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: zhes ba ni sgra dang tshad ma la sogs pa'i chos kun gyis stong ngo //
translated: This means that it is empty of all phenomena, such as sound, valid cognition, and so forth.

original: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
translated: The nature of emptiness and compassion.

original: zhes pa ni stong pa shes rab skye ba med pa dang / snying rje thabs khyad bar can gnyis las rang bzhin dga' ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni stong pa shes rab skye ba med pa dang / snying rje thabs khyad bar can gnyis las rang bzhin dga' ba 'byung ngo //
translated: This means that from the two‚Äîthe emptiness of non-arising wisdom and the special method of compassion‚Äîthe joy of the nature arises.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa la tshangs pa ni don yod par grub pa ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa la tshangs pa ni don yod par grub pa ste /
translated: Brahma and so forth. Brahma is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ni ye shes yin la ye shes thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni bya ba nan tan yin no ;
analyzed: de ni ye shes yin la ye shes thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni bya ba nan tan yin no ;
translated: He is wisdom, and the nature of all wisdoms is the performance of activities.

original: /'o na ye shes la tshangs pa zhes ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
analyzed: /'o na ye shes la tshangs pa zhes ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
translated: Well then, why is pristine consciousness called Brahma?

original: rtog pa thams cad dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshangs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshangs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is pure of all concepts is called Brahma.

original: de yang 'di skad du 'byung ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du 'byung ste /
translated: This is stated as follows:

original: dngos po'i bag chags rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i bag chags rang bzhin ni //
translated: The habitual tendencies of entities are

original: ma spangs dag pas yi shes 'dod //
analyzed: ma spangs dag pas yi shes 'dod //
translated: not abandoned, but are asserted to be pure pristine consciousness.

original: ces so // 'di skad bstan te ;üîΩdon dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi //
analyzed: ces so // 'di skad bstan te ; don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi //
translated: This is taught as follows:üîΩThe bindu of bodhicittaüîΩwhere the two truths,

original: bden gnyis gang du 'dres pa yis //üîΩbyang chub sems kyi thig le khab //üîΩde tshe tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin //
analyzed: bden gnyis gang du 'dres pa yis // byang chub sems kyi thig le khab // de tshe tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin //
translated: ultimate and relative, mix,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: is Brahma, the holder of pristine consciousness.

original: nam mkha'i dbus na thig le bde //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbus na thig le bde //
translated: The bindu of bliss in the middle of space

original: byang chub sems kyi dngos 'di yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi dngos 'di yin //
translated: is the entity of bodhicitta.

original: gcig bu'i bdag nyid dngos po bral ;
analyzed: gcig bu'i bdag nyid dngos po bral ;
translated: The entity that is the nature of oneness

original: / de dus tshangs pa'i bdag nyid do //üîΩzhes pas so //
analyzed: / de dus tshangs pa'i bdag nyid do // zhes pas so //
translated: is Brahma at that time.

original: des ni tshangs pa don yod grub par bstan to //
analyzed: des ni tshangs pa don yod grub par bstan to //
translated: That explains the Brahma Amoghasiddhi.

original: khyab 'jug ces pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: khyab 'jug ces pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Vishnu is Ratnasambhava.

original: de bzhin snang ba mtha' yas drag po yin te des mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bcom nas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes sbyin par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin snang ba mtha' yas drag po yin te des mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bcom nas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes sbyin par mdzad do //
translated: Likewise, AmitƒÅbha is wrathful, for he destroys all adverse factors and bestows the wisdom of discernment.

original: dbang phyug ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: ƒ™≈õvara is Ak·π£obhya.

original: rtag tu zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: rtag tu zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Always peaceful is Vairocana.

original: rlung gi 'khor lo la sogs pa lnga la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo la sogs pa lnga la yang sbyar ro //
translated: This is also applied to the five, such as the wind wheel.

original: de rnams kun zhes pa ni de 'das ma thag la /
analyzed: de rnams kun zhes pa ni de 'das ma thag la /
translated: All of them is just after ‚Äúthose.‚Äù

original: rnams kun ni rigs lnga po la bya'o //
analyzed: rnams kun ni rigs lnga po la bya'o //
translated: All means the five families.

original: yab yin no zhes pa ni de kho na nyid @169b spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes brjod du med pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po de la bya'o //
analyzed: yab yin no zhes pa ni de kho na nyid @169b spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes brjod du med pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po de la bya'o //
translated: They are the fathers means that they are the lords of Vajrasattva, the lord of inexpressible suchness, the wisdom free from conceptual elaborations.

original: spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku bde ba chen po yin na rdo rje sems dpa' gzugs kyi sku yin pas de gnyis mi 'gal lam /
analyzed: spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku bde ba chen po yin na rdo rje sems dpa' gzugs kyi sku yin pas de gnyis mi 'gal lam /
translated: If the wisdom free from conceptual elaborations is the great bliss dharmakƒÅya, and Vajrasattva is the form kƒÅya, aren‚Äôt those two incompatible?

original: mi 'gal te rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gal te rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: They are not incompatible, because the vajra is the indivisible nature of the five wisdoms.

original: sems dpa' ni sprul pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni sprul pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste /
translated: The hero is the one who benefits sentient beings through emanations and so forth.

original: de yang rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad dang bral ba las ni rim gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa de las sprul nas don byed do //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad dang bral ba las ni rim gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa de las sprul nas don byed do //
translated: Moreover, from the natural joy, free from all elaborations, the sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya, complete with all the major marks, gradually emanates and benefits.

original: byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
analyzed: byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
translated: That activity is the supreme, the marvelous.

original: 'di nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
analyzed: 'di nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
translated: This very thing is the drop of gnosis.

original: zhes pa rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba'i thig le kun gyi ngo bo bcu drug pa chad pa dang mchog dang mi mnyam mo //
analyzed: zhes pa rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba'i thig le kun gyi ngo bo bcu drug pa chad pa dang mchog dang mi mnyam mo //
translated: The drop of bliss of natural joy, the essence of all, is the sixteenth, the supreme, the unequaled.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go //
analyzed: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go //
translated: the supreme is the lord of siddhas.

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: It is said.

original: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
analyzed: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
translated: It exists within all the elements.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so forth.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'i nang na yod do //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'i nang na yod do //
translated: It exists within the elements such as earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: sku lnga'i zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi bdag po yin no //
analyzed: sku lnga'i zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi bdag po yin no //
translated: The five kƒÅyas are Vairocana and so forth, and he is their lord.

original: mkha' lnga'i bdag nyid skye med do //
analyzed: mkha' lnga'i bdag nyid skye med do //
translated: is the nature of the five space, the unborn.

original: zhes pa ni shes par sla'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes par sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
analyzed: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
translated: Dissolves into the five space.

original: zhes pa ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang rnam par shes pa dang lnga'i nang du bsdu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang rnam par shes pa dang lnga'i nang du bsdu'o //
translated: This means that it is gathered into the five, earth, water, fire, wind, and consciousness.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pas byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pas byed pa yin no //
translated: All the buddhas pay homage to it.

original: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
analyzed: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
translated: This is the great secret pristine consciousness.

original: ji ltar nor brkus mi rnyed ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar nor brkus mi rnyed ltar //
translated: Just as a thief does not find a hidden treasure,

original: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
translated: it should be guarded with effort.

original: zhes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa de rtog pa dang / mi mthun pa kun phye nas rang bzhin dga' ba shin tu rnyed par dka' ba de dbang la sogs pas thob par byas la de nas sems la bcang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa de rtog pa dang / mi mthun pa kun phye nas rang bzhin dga' ba shin tu rnyed par dka' ba de dbang la sogs pas thob par byas la de nas sems la bcang ngo //
translated: This means that having distinguished the conceptual and the non-conceptual, the extremely difficult to find natural joy is attained through empowerment and so forth.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u dang po'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u dang po'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /

original: // / dang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'dir zhus so //
analyzed: // / dang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'dir zhus so //

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes pa ni sdud pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes pa ni sdud pa'i tshig go //
translated: The request of the Lord of the Gods is the summarizing statement.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni snyan pas bod pa'o //üîΩde nyid gsum la sogs pa gsum po la @170a * //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni snyan pas bod pa'o // de nyid gsum la sogs pa gsum po la @170a * //

original: bzhir phye nas zhus so //
analyzed: bzhir phye nas zhus so //
translated: The three realities, etc., are divided into three, and then requested.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lha'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lha'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gsungs so //
translated: The Bhagavat said is spoken to the entire retinue, such as the Lord of the Gods, etc.

original: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
translated: The three realities are the body, speech, and mind.üîΩThe three vajras are the supreme intuition.

original: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes mchog / ces pha ni sku rdo rje rnam bar snang mdzad de mchog gi dga' ba dang / snang ba mtha' yas chad ba'i dga' ba rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes mchog / ces pha ni sku rdo rje rnam bar snang mdzad de mchog gi dga' ba dang / snang ba mtha' yas chad ba'i dga' ba rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje'o //
translated: The father is the body vajra, Vairochana, the supreme joy, and the vajra speech, Amitabha, the joy of cessation. The vajra intuition is the vajra mind, Vajrasattva, the natural joy.

original: zla ba bde ba mchog gi nang //
analyzed: zla ba bde ba mchog gi nang //
translated: In the moon, the supreme bliss,

original: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
analyzed: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
translated: that is the aggregates, the faculties, and the elements.

original: zhes pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / khams la sogs pa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / khams la sogs pa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the mandala of the Tathagatas of the five aggregates, etc., the Bodhisattvas of the sense organs, etc., and the goddesses of the elements, etc.

original: yang na byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yang na byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Or else, it is the essence of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje snying po zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje snying po zhes pa ni /
translated: The great seal, the essence of the vajra,

original: ye shes sems dpa' ste ye nas gnas ba'o //

original: yang na bde ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: yang na bde ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Or else, it is the intuition of bliss.

original: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
translated: Its limit is remembered in the bhaga.

original: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid do //

original: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
analyzed: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
translated: The limit and the appearance are consciousness.

original: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //

original: zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyu gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyu gnyis te /

original: kun rdzob kyi dngos por chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas na chu'i zla ba bzhin snang la don dam par stong pa kho na'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi dngos por chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas na chu'i zla ba bzhin snang la don dam par stong pa kho na'o //

original: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
analyzed: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //

original: ces pa'i chos ni gzung 'dzin no //
analyzed: ces pa'i chos ni gzung 'dzin no //

original: de'i dag pa ni dri ma med pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dag pa ni dri ma med pa'i dga' ba'o //

original: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //

original: yang dag 'od las thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: yang dag 'od las thams cad 'byung //

original: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ces pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos ma lus pa kun 'di las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ces pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos ma lus pa kun 'di las 'byung ngo //

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o zhes pa ni sku bzhi'i dngos po'i bdag nyid bde ba chen @170b po'i sku bcom ldan 'das so //

original: don gyis shes par 'bad la bya //
analyzed: don gyis shes par 'bad la bya //

original: rtsa rnams med na phung po med ;
analyzed: rtsa rnams med na phung po med ;

original: / phung po med na bde med pas //
analyzed: / phung po med na bde med pas //

original: me tog med na dri med ltar //
analyzed: me tog med na dri med ltar //

original: de bas 'bras mchog thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bas 'bras mchog thob mi 'gyur //
translated: the supreme result will not be attained.

original: thos par bya ba'i don du ni //
analyzed: thos par bya ba'i don du ni //
translated: In order to hear,

analyzed: mdo ru bsdus na bcu po 'di //
translated: these ten are summarized in the s≈´tras.

original: don 'di ma nor bla ma la //
analyzed: don 'di ma nor bla ma la //

original: yang nas yang du zhu bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang nas yang du zhu bar bya'o //

original: de'i phyir shes par dka' bas 'on kyang bsdus pa'i don gyis gsang ba dang zab pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ci la brtags pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes par dka' bas 'on kyang bsdus pa'i don gyis gsang ba dang zab pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ci la brtags pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is difficult to understand, one should understand what the name is designated to by the condensed meaning, such as secret, profound, and so on.

original: de ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

original: zla pa nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus tshigs su rgyas pa'o zhes pa ni thabs shes rab gnyis ka'i rin po che dang / sangs rgyas rin chen gyi snod gnyis ka bde ba chen pos rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: zla pa nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus tshigs su rgyas pa'o zhes pa ni thabs shes rab gnyis ka'i rin po che dang / sangs rgyas rin chen gyi snod gnyis ka bde ba chen pos rgyas pa ste /
translated: The time of the eclipse of the moon and sun is the expansion, which is the two vessels of the jewel of method and wisdom and the jewel of the buddhas expanding with great bliss.

original: chad pa'i dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i bar rang bzhin ye shes brtan pa la gzas zin zhes bshad do //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i bar rang bzhin ye shes brtan pa la gzas zin zhes bshad do //
translated: The eclipse of the stable pristine consciousness of the nature between the cessation of joy and supreme joy is explained as the eclipse of the stable pristine consciousness of the nature.

original: rtsa'i don bstan nas da dbang gi rim pa ston to //
analyzed: rtsa'i don bstan nas da dbang gi rim pa ston to //
translated: Having explained the meaning of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, now the stage of empowerment is explained.

analyzed: de nas zhes pa na 'brel ma chad pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: After is a word that does not break the connection.

original: dbang gi rim pa bshad de zhes ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa'i dbang la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dbang gi rim pa bshad de zhes ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa'i dbang la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The vase, secret, wisdom-knowledge, and fourth empowerments are called that.

original: ji lta'i ni go rims zhes pa ni snga ma rgyu //
analyzed: ji lta'i ni go rims zhes pa ni snga ma rgyu //
translated: How is the sequence? The former is the cause.

original: phyi ma rnams 'bras bu rim pa ma nor bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma rnams 'bras bu rim pa ma nor bar bya'o //
translated: The latter are the result. The sequence should be done without error.

original: dbang bskur mchog ni mnyes pa gang //
analyzed: dbang bskur mchog ni mnyes pa gang //
translated: The supreme empowerment is pleasing.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang / 'bras bu'i rim pas bzhi ba rnyed kyi mngon sum du ni mi rnyed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang / 'bras bu'i rim pas bzhi ba rnyed kyi mngon sum du ni mi rnyed do //
translated: This is said to be the fourth empowerment that is found by the sequence of cause and result, but it is not found in actuality.

original: thams cad du ni phod par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad du ni phod par 'gyur //
translated: Everywhere one becomes capable.

original: zhes pa ni bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni thun mong dang mchog la sogs pa dang / ci bsams pa yang 'grub par bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni thun mong dang mchog la sogs pa dang / ci bsams pa yang 'grub par bshad do //
translated: This is explained as the attainment of the fourth empowerment, the accomplishment of the common, supreme, and so on, and whatever is thought.

original: das ni dbang gi yon tan dang 'bras bu bstan to //
analyzed: das ni dbang gi yon tan dang 'bras bu bstan to //
translated: That explains the qualities and results of the empowerment.

original: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu ni snod dang skal bar ldan pa sdom pa dang dam tshig bsrung ba'i slob ma'o //
analyzed: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu ni snod dang skal bar ldan pa sdom pa dang dam tshig bsrung ba'i slob ma'o //

original: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //
analyzed: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //

original: zhes pa ni kun gyi mchog tu gyur ba'i bla mas slob bu mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa de la dbang gi rim pa @172a * //üîΩbskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni kun gyi mchog tu gyur ba'i bla mas slob bu mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa de la dbang gi rim pa @172a * // bskur bar bya'o //
translated: This is the supreme consecration of the disciple endowed with all the characteristics by the guru who is the supreme one of all.üîΩThe consecration should be conferred in stages.

original: mtshan dang ldan pa gang la bya //
analyzed: mtshan dang ldan pa gang la bya //
translated: To whom is it conferred?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can thams cad la dbri bkol ma mdzad na //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can thams cad la dbri bkol ma mdzad na //
translated: The Blessed One does not discriminate among sentient beings.

original: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur sti rim gro la sogs pa ma byas pa rnams ni tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i dus la sogs par bsod nams zhan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin rlabs dang phrad par mi 'gyur
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur sti rim gro la sogs pa ma byas pa rnams ni tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i dus la sogs par bsod nams zhan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin rlabs dang phrad par mi 'gyur
translated: However, those who in the past did not honor and serve the Tathagata, due to their meager merit in this and future lives, do not encounter the blessings of the Blessed One.

original: ro // mi phrad pa'i phyir na snod dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan no //
analyzed: ro // mi phrad pa'i phyir na snod dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan no //
translated: Because they do not encounter, they are not vessels and do not have the characteristics.

original: de yang 'di skad du //
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du //

analyzed: gang 'di dge slong dngos gnas dang // gang zhig rgan por gnas pa dang // gang yang rtog la dga' ba'i mi //

original: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
analyzed: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: So it is said.üîΩMoreover,

analyzed: gzhan yang // mu stegs pa dang nyan thos dngos //

analyzed: de'i phyir snod dang mi ldan pa la gsang sngags kyi dbang mi bskur ro //

original: mtshan la sogs pa ni 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: mtshan la sogs pa ni 'gal ba med do //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang dgongs nas so //

analyzed: me tog gis dang snyim par ldan //

analyzed: yon dbul zin sa dga' dang bcas //

analyzed: lha yid bang phyug dbang bskur bya //

analyzed: zhes par sngar sa dang dkyil 'khor gyi thig dang sta gon dang rab gnas dang khrus kyi cho ga la sogs pa kun rdzogs nas mig dgab pa'i cho ga bya nas bla ma la me tog gtor ba dang / dkyil 'khor la gtor ba dang /
translated: Having completed all the preliminaries, such as the ground, the ma·πá·∏çala lines, the preparatory rites, the consecration, the bathing ritual, and so on, having performed the rite of covering the eyes, having tossed flowers to the guru and the ma·πá·∏çala,

original: dam tshig gi cho ga nas yon dbus ba'i rim pa kun dbang nod kar bya'o ;
analyzed: dam tshig gi cho ga nas yon dbus ba'i rim pa kun dbang nod kar bya'o ;

original: / dbang bskur la ni sangs rgyas sa //
analyzed: / dbang bskur la ni sangs rgyas sa //

original: zhes pa ni bcu gcig nas bcu drug gi bar 'thob bo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bcu gcig nas bcu drug gi bar 'thob bo //

original: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes pa ni bar der thob par des sam som nyi dang yid gnyis mi bya'o // de bas thams cad du 'bad de /

original: dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya ;
analyzed: dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya ;

analyzed: / zhes pa ni slob mas bkur sti yon la sogs pas bla ma mnyes par bya //

original: bla mas kyang rim pa dang don ma nor bar dbang gi rgyal po bzhi pa yan chad rdzogs par sbyin no //
analyzed: bla mas kyang rim pa dang don ma nor bar dbang gi rgyal po bzhi pa yan chad rdzogs par sbyin no //

original: dbang bskur bzhin du dbye ba ni //
analyzed: dbang bskur bzhin du dbye ba ni //

analyzed: zhes ba ni dang po bum pa dang / gnyis pa gsang ba dang / gsum pa @172b shes rab ye shes dang // bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no //
translated: This means that the first is the vase initiation, the second is the secret initiation, the third is the gnosis of the wisdom consort initiation, and the fourth is just like that.

original: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //
analyzed: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

original: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
analyzed: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
translated: The fourfold empowerment is divided into two groups of four.üîΩThe fourfold empowerment is divided into two groups of four.

analyzed: zhes pa ni bzhi gnyis la brgyad de bum pa'i dbang ni mi bskyod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The vase empowerment is endowed with the result of Ak·π£obhya.

analyzed: dbu rgyan dang / rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ming dang de bzhin no //
translated: The crown, vajra, bell, and name empowerments are the same.

original: rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / skyabs sbyin la sogs pa brgyad po'i dbang bskur ni slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / skyabs sbyin la sogs pa brgyad po'i dbang bskur ni slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The eight empowerments of the vajra, the prophecy, the gift of fearlessness, and so on, are the master‚Äôs.

original: rdo rje'i dbang la gsum du dbye //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang la gsum du dbye //
translated: The vajra empowerment is divided into three.

original: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis gsal //
analyzed: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis gsal //
translated: I will clarify it to be equal to space.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni nam mkha' dang mnyam du khungs bstan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni nam mkha' dang mnyam du khungs bstan pa ste /
translated: The vajra master empowerment is equal to space, as indicated by the source.

original: dam tshig gsum gyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum gyi dbang ngo //
translated: It is the empowerment of the three sacred commitments.

original: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
analyzed: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
translated: That empowerment is a jewel.

original: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
analyzed: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
translated: It is honored by the three realms.

original: zhes pa ni bum pa ru sman dang 'bru dang rin po che la sogs pa dang ldan pa'am //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bum pa ru sman dang 'bru dang rin po che la sogs pa dang ldan pa'am //
translated: The vase is endowed with medicine, grain, jewels, and so on.

original: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa dang ; kun rdzogs pa la 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag dang mchod pa'i gnas so //

translated: The eleventh initiation is the five nectars, and the complete one is the state of being worthy of homage and worship of the three worlds.

original: yang na nang gi slob dpon gyi bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba'am/ gsang pa'i slob ma rang gi bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang rdzogs par bskur na dngos su khams gsum gyis phyag byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na nang gi slob dpon gyi bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba'am/ gsang pa'i slob ma rang gi bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang rdzogs par bskur na dngos su khams gsum gyis phyag byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Alternatively, the initiation is conferred by the inner master with the vase, etc., or the secret disciple is directly conferred the complete initiation of his own vase, etc., and then he becomes worthy of homage of the three worlds.

original: yang na sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod dang rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa yod pa thabs kyi rdo rje la dbang bskur ba dang / phyag bya ba'i ngo bos rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod dang rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa yod pa thabs kyi rdo rje la dbang bskur ba dang / phyag bya ba'i ngo bos rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, the initiation is conferred on the method vajra, who has the vessel of the precious buddha and the five precious substances, etc., and is complete in the nature of being worthy of homage.

original: shes rab la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: shes rab la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true for the wisdom consort.

original: yang na dbang gi yon tan gyi rim pa gsal bas shes par 'dod pas de ru blta'o //
analyzed: yang na dbang gi yon tan gyi rim pa gsal bas shes par 'dod pas de ru blta'o //
translated: Alternatively, since the stages of the qualities of the initiation are clarified, those who wish to know them should look there.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
translated: For those devoted to Yoga Tantra,

original: zhes pa ni yo ga phyi la dga' ba'i slob ma la bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yo ga phyi la dga' ba'i slob ma la bya'o //
translated: this refers to disciples who delight in outer yoga.

original: dbang brgyad phye ba sbyin par bya //
analyzed: dbang brgyad phye ba sbyin par bya //

original: zhes pa ni chu dang / dbu rgyan dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / ming dang lnga ni rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chu dang / dbu rgyan dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / ming dang lnga ni rigs lnga'o //

analyzed: brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan dang / skyabs sbyin te sngar bstan pa bzhin no //

original: rnal 'byor bla ma la mos rnams //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla ma la mos rnams //

analyzed: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po thob pa'i thabs kyi'o //

original: bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya //
analyzed: bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya //

analyzed: zhes pa ni snga ma'i thog tu sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsum ste bcu gcig go // rnal 'byor @173a * //

original: gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o //

analyzed: zhes pa ni bcu gnyis pa'i mchog go //

original: de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye //

original: zhes pa ni 'og nas gsum du ston to //

analyzed: shes rab gnyis su dbye bar bya //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa 'bum byas nas las la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: skyes ma'e aom a'a: h'um phat / 'jigs ma'i aom a'a: h'um phat ;

original: 'od ma'i aom mi h'um phat /

original: gzhan rnams kyang de kho na bzhin no //

original: gzhan 'khor lo drug gi sngags dang dbyangs yig / gsal byed kyi yi ge dang / gtor ma'i sngags dang / khro bo'i sngags dang / sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum dang / 'di rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad do ;

analyzed: // / sngags kyi rim pa bshad nas mchod sbyin gyi rim pa ston pa la ni /

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim gsum de ltar ro //

original: snang ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo ste skye'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo ste skye'o //

translated: ‚ÄúSpace‚Äù is the great-bliss wheel.

analyzed: ye shes zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum po yang 'khor lo bzhin sbyar ro // sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //

original: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa'o //
translated: means the assembly of yoginƒ´s.

original: au rgyan la sogs pa gnas su ni //
analyzed: au rgyan la sogs pa gnas su ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni au rgyan gnas dang / dz'a landha ra dang / pu li ra dang / k'a ma ru la sogs pa'i gnas dang / nye pa'i gnas la sogs par ro //

original: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo rnams //
translated: The goddesses such as Laksmi,

analyzed: zhes pa ni lha mo rnams kyang de ltar gnas pa bzhin du dbye bar bya'o //

analyzed: mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che //

analyzed: zhes pa ni de rgyas na bde ba chen po thob bo //

original: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye //
analyzed: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye //

original: sems dang sems kyi bye brag ces pa ni sems bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa bye brag gis ston pas thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems kyi bye brag ces pa ni sems bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa bye brag gis ston pas thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: kha cig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs //

analyzed: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: zhes pa ni tshe 'di las tshe gzhan mi 'pho ba phung po lhag ma med pa'i bde ba chen po'i sku'o //

analyzed: dper na rgyal po chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal aindra bh'u t'i mgon po lta bu'o //

analyzed: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //

original: yang na phung po spangs pa @179a * //
analyzed: yang na phung po spangs pa @179a * //

analyzed: tsam ; / zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bag chags dang bcas nas gnas pa'o //

original: ci bsams pa thams cad 'grub bo zhes so //
analyzed: ci bsams pa thams cad 'grub bo zhes so //

analyzed: de lta bas na / brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad //

original: 'bad min chen pos grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'bad min chen pos grub pa yin //

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u drug pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u drug pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /

analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga ni zhes pa ni mchod ces pa'o //

analyzed: de yang yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa la cho ga zhes so //

original: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //

analyzed: yid 'phrog lha'i zhes pa ni lha thams cad yid 'jug pa'o //

analyzed: me dang sgron ma rmad du byung //

analyzed: bcu drug pa ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug po 'di sngags re rer sbyar ba'o //

analyzed: mar ngo'i dang po'i zhes pa ni tshes bcu drug pa sngar bzhin no //
