analyzed: zhes so // yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag tu //
translated: Therefore, it is said, By the offering that arises from the mind of enlightenment.üîΩThe distinction of the bright and dark lunar fortnights

original: zhes pa ni a'a li dang k'a li ye shes kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni a'a li dang k'a li ye shes kyi khyad par ro //
translated: is the difference between the ƒÅli and kƒÅli wisdoms.

original: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor ni de gnyis dbyer med par sbyar ba las 'di lta bu'i 'khor lo 'byung ngo //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor ni de gnyis dbyer med par sbyar ba las 'di lta bu'i 'khor lo 'byung ngo //
translated: The application of wisdom and means is the application of those two inseparably, from which this kind of wheel arises.

original: sku gsum ni bde ba chen po ru rlag pas chos kyi sku'o ;
analyzed: sku gsum ni bde ba chen po ru rlag pas chos kyi sku'o ;
translated: The three bodies are the dharmakƒÅya because they are dissolved into great bliss.

original: / longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: / longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The enjoyment is the sambhogakƒÅya.

original: snying gar dbang byas pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: snying gar dbang byas pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: The control at the heart is the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya.

original: yang na re re la yang gsum gsum mo //üîΩye shes ni sku gsum dbyer med pa'am /
analyzed: yang na re re la yang gsum gsum mo // ye shes ni sku gsum dbyer med pa'am /
translated: Alternatively, each of those has three.

original: dga' ba'i gnas la sogs par sku gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i gnas la sogs par sku gnas pa la'o //
translated: Wisdom is the inseparability of the three bodies or the abiding of the body in the places of joy and so on.

original: de lta bu'i dngos po la dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dngos po la dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
translated: Such a thing is called a 'mandala.'

original: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
analyzed: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
translated: The 'days and letters' are the mantras.

original: zhes pa ni chos zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rim pa dang yi ge'i ngo bo thig le dang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs dang shes rab byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le de bsrung ba'i phyir sngags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rim pa dang yi ge'i ngo bo thig le dang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs dang shes rab byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le de bsrung ba'i phyir sngags zhes bya'o //
translated: The mantra is called so because it protects the dharma, which is the stage of wisdom, the essence of the syllable, the bindu, and the essence of the mantra, the bindu of the bodhicitta of method and wisdom.

original: ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
translated: The moon increases.

original: zhes pa ni ye shes rgyas par mdzad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes rgyas par mdzad do //
translated: It causes the expansion of wisdom.

original: thig le dang mkha' 'gog pa yis //
analyzed: thig le dang mkha' 'gog pa yis //
translated: By blocking the bindu and space,

original: rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: that nature arises.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
translated: And so on.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo thig le la gnas pa de ye shes rlung 'gag pa dang h'um phat bkod la spro bsdus rang bzhin dga' bar 'byung ngo ;
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo thig le la gnas pa de ye shes rlung 'gag pa dang h'um phat bkod la spro bsdus rang bzhin dga' bar 'byung ngo ;
translated: The essence of bodhicitta, abiding in the bindu, when the wisdom vƒÅyu is blocked and the h≈´·πÉ pha·π≠ is arranged, the bindu is expanded and contracted, and the nature arises as joy.

original: / de ltar ma yin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma rnyed do //
analyzed: / de ltar ma yin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma rnyed do //
translated: If it is not like that, it will not be found even by the tathƒÅgatas.

original: bla ma'i zhal la ltos nas 'od rab 'thob bo //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal la ltos nas 'od rab 'thob bo //
translated: The light is obtained by relying on the guru‚Äôs instructions.

original: de thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: de thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: If that is obtained, one is the nature of all tathƒÅgatas, and so on.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bdun pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o; ;
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bdun pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o; ;
translated: The difficult points of chapter seven of the Lamp of the Natural Light of Pristine Cognition have been explained.

original: //'di na mar ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga ston pa la ni /üîΩde nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
analyzed: //'di na mar ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga ston pa la ni / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, in the teaching on the rite of the homa,

original: zhes pas bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
translated: The following is to be explained.

original: sbyin sreg sdig ni 'jig byed pa //üîΩzhes pa ni 'dis sdig pa thams cad sreg pa ni las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa'i @180a * //
analyzed: sbyin sreg sdig ni 'jig byed pa // zhes pa ni 'dis sdig pa thams cad sreg pa ni las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa'i @180a * //
translated: The homa destroys evil.

original: phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang / khams la sogs pa'i rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i dngos po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang / khams la sogs pa'i rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i dngos po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: By this, all evil is burned, and the evil of the conceptualization of the five aggregates, the sense spheres, the elements, and so on, which is produced by karma and the afflictions, is destroyed.

original: de yang zhi ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩrgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po'i rim pa ni las kyi sgo nas ming dang rim pas dbye'o ;
analyzed: de yang zhi ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te / rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po'i rim pa ni las kyi sgo nas ming dang rim pas dbye'o ;
translated: Moreover, it is said, peaceful and so on.

original: / zhi ba'i hom khung zhes pa nas //
analyzed: / zhi ba'i hom khung zhes pa nas //
translated: The sequence of peaceful, enriching, powerful, and fierce is distinguished by name and sequence according to the rite.

original: gru gsum mo zhes pa'i bar gyis dbyibs bstan to //
analyzed: gru gsum mo zhes pa'i bar gyis dbyibs bstan to //
translated: The shape is taught from the peaceful hearth up to triangular.

original: dkar po zhes pa nas rim pas so zhes pa'i bar gyis kha dog bstan to //
analyzed: dkar po zhes pa nas rim pas so zhes pa'i bar gyis kha dog bstan to //
translated: The passage from white up to in order teaches the colors.

original: rgya mtsho zhes pa nas tshad yin no zhes pa'i bar gyis me lha'i brda'i sgo nas tshad du bshad do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho zhes pa nas tshad yin no zhes pa'i bar gyis me lha'i brda'i sgo nas tshad du bshad do //
translated: The passage from ocean up to measure explains the measure by way of the sign of the fire god.

original: gzhan ma bya ba nas gzhan ma grub bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis dgug pa la sogs pa yang snga mas 'grub par bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan ma bya ba nas gzhan ma grub bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis dgug pa la sogs pa yang snga mas 'grub par bstan to //
translated: The two words not other and not established teach that summoning and so forth are accomplished by the former.

original: hom khung re rer snying gar pad //
analyzed: hom khung re rer snying gar pad //
translated: In each fire pit, in the heart, a lotus,

original: rigs kyi las kyi go rims so //
analyzed: rigs kyi las kyi go rims so //
translated: in the order of the family and the action.

original: zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas padma'i kha dog phye la rang rang gi rigs gzhag go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas padma'i kha dog phye la rang rang gi rigs gzhag go //
translated: This means that one should open the lotus color according to the division of the actions such as pacification and so forth, and place the respective families.

original: de ste sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
analyzed: de ste sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
translated: If it is a variegated vajra,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni phyag mtshan dang sna tshogs rdo rje h'um gi 'od 'phro ba dang rlung dang nyi ma dang de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dang bcas pa las dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa dang / ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs la mchod yon la sogs pa dbul ba dang gnyis su med par bstim pa dang /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni phyag mtshan dang sna tshogs rdo rje h'um gi 'od 'phro ba dang rlung dang nyi ma dang de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dang bcas pa las dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa dang / ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs la mchod yon la sogs pa dbul ba dang gnyis su med par bstim pa dang /
translated: The wisdom fire god is invited and the libation and so forth are offered, and he is dissolved into the pledge being.

original: de la mchod pa la sogs pa rdzas thams cad dbul ba rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de la mchod pa la sogs pa rdzas thams cad dbul ba rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: The offerings and so forth are all offered to that.

original: phyi nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa dang / dgang gzar la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni skabs dang sbyar la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa dang / dgang gzar la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni skabs dang sbyar la shes par bya'o //
translated: The divisions of outer and inner and so forth, the teaching of the stages of the locations, and the characteristics of the ladle and so forth should be understood in context.

original: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan //
translated: The adept is endowed with good qualities.

original: sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che //
translated: He has great learning in mantra and tantra.

original: sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos //
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos //
translated: He is devoted to the recitation of mantra.

original: yid mi 'phrogs pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: yid mi 'phrogs pa gsal ba'o //
translated: He is clear and not distracted.

original: zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ba dbang gi rim pa dang / dam tshig la gnas pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ba dbang gi rim pa dang / dam tshig la gnas pa /
translated: who abides in the commitments,

original: skyon gyis ma gos pa /
analyzed: skyon gyis ma gos pa /
translated: who is unstained by faults,

original: shes rab dang / snying rje che ba ;
analyzed: shes rab dang / snying rje che ba ;
translated: who has great wisdom and compassion,

original: rgyud thams cad kyi thos pa'i don la brtson pa /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi thos pa'i don la brtson pa /
translated: who is diligent in the meaning of the teachings of all tantras,üîΩwho is diligent in meditative concentration and mantra repetition,

original: bsam gtan dang / bzlas pa la brtson pa 'di lta bu'i sgrub pa po gzhan gyi bsam pa la mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / bzlas pa la brtson pa 'di lta bu'i sgrub pa po gzhan gyi bsam pa la mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: who is not carried away by the thoughts of others,

original: che ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa la /
analyzed: che ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa la /
translated: who is adorned with great qualities,

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor shes rab can //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor shes rab can // zhes gsungs so //
translated: is a yogi/nƒ´ who knows wisdom.

original: @180b gang zag 'di'i don rin po che lta bur yang bstan te /
analyzed: @180b gang zag 'di'i don rin po che lta bur yang bstan te /
translated: This person is also taught to be like a jewel:

original: thig le'i tshul ni ye shes che //
analyzed: thig le'i tshul ni ye shes che //
translated: The way of the bindu is great wisdom.

original: bye brag shes pa rin chen rigs //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bye brag shes pa rin chen rigs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The knowledge of distinctions is the jewel family.

original: de yang thig le la sogs pa'i dbye bas dga' ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par shes pa'i bdag nyid ni rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: de yang thig le la sogs pa'i dbye bas dga' ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par shes pa'i bdag nyid ni rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: Moreover, the nature of knowing the distinctions of the wisdoms of joy and so on through the divisions of the bindus and so on is the jewel family.

original: rigs snga'i zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: rigs snga'i zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
translated: The ‚Äúmantra family‚Äù is the TathƒÅgata family, Vairocana and so forth.

original: gzhon nu ma ni lnga zhes pas ni lo brgyad gnyis grangs lnga ste /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma ni lnga zhes pas ni lo brgyad gnyis grangs lnga ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe girl is five years old‚Äù means she is twelve years old.

original: shes rab ma mtshan ldan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ma mtshan ldan zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe qualified wisdom woman‚Äù is the one who is to be taken.

original: yid dga' khu ba yis ni tshim //
analyzed: yid dga' khu ba yis ni tshim //
translated: ‚ÄúWith the fluid of joy she is satisfied‚Äù

original: spyan rings ma dang dag pa ma //
analyzed: spyan rings ma dang dag pa ma //
translated: ‚Äúwith eyes long and languid‚Äù

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth.

original: shes rab ma de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi ros bde ba /
analyzed: shes rab ma de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi ros bde ba /
translated: That wisdom woman is happy with the taste of the bodhicitta.

original: mig 'khyug la ring ba /
analyzed: mig 'khyug la ring ba /
translated: Her eyes are long and languid.

original: rtog pa chung ba /üîΩnu ma 'bur ba /
analyzed: rtog pa chung ba / nu ma 'bur ba /
translated: She has few thoughts.

original: sra ba / 'jam pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sra ba / 'jam pa dang ldan pa /
translated: Her breasts are firm and full.

original: yan lag la sogs pa mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag la sogs pa mdzes pa'o //
translated: She has a beautiful body and so forth.

original: de rigs kyi yum du byin gyis brlabs pa las bsgrub pa'i don du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de rigs kyi yum du byin gyis brlabs pa las bsgrub pa'i don du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: She is consecrated as the mother of the family and is to be engaged for the purpose of practice.

original: sbyin sreg la gzhan bcug pas chog mod ce na /
analyzed: sbyin sreg la gzhan bcug pas chog mod ce na /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is sufficient to engage another in the fire sacrifice, is it not?‚Äù

original: mi btub par gsungs te /
analyzed: mi btub par gsungs te /
translated: It is said that it is not sufficient.

original: sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the purpose of the fire sacrifice,

original: rigs lnga mo ni gzhug par bya //
analyzed: rigs lnga mo ni gzhug par bya //
translated: one should engage a woman of the five families.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'o na rigs ldan mo dngos kho na gzhug gam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na rigs ldan mo dngos kho na gzhug gam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: rigs kyi mtshan nyid sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi mtshan nyid sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is endowed with the characteristics of the family, etc.

original: de yang 'di skad du 'byung ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du 'byung ste /
translated: And this is stated in the following:üîΩSister, wife, daughter, young girl,

original: sring mo dang ni mna' 'am dang // bu mo chung ma sgyug mo rnams //
analyzed: sring mo dang ni mna' 'am dang // bu mo chung ma sgyug mo rnams //
translated: wife of a friend, and wife of another

original: rigs lnga'i yum du bshad pa yang //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i yum du bshad pa yang //
translated: are explained as the mothers of the five families.

original: ji bzhin ma yin bdag gis phye //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma yin bdag gis phye // zhes gsungs so //
translated: I have distinguished them as they are not.

original: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
translated: By the rite of wisdom and means,

original: bla ma nyid kyis dang por mchod //
analyzed: bla ma nyid kyis dang por mchod //
translated: the guru himself is worshipped first.

original: ces pa ni bla ma dang lhan cig bsrub pa dang srub thabs kyi sbyor bas dga' ba'i rim pas mchod pa dang / sangs rgyas rin po che'i dgyes pa'i mchod pa ni h'um gi blugs gzar gyis bdun blugs pas /
analyzed: ces pa ni bla ma dang lhan cig bsrub pa dang srub thabs kyi sbyor bas dga' ba'i rim pas mchod pa dang / sangs rgyas rin po che'i dgyes pa'i mchod pa ni h'um gi blugs gzar gyis bdun blugs pas /
translated: The worship of the guru together with the consort by the process of union and the process of the sequence of joy is the worship of the precious buddha. The worship of the seven with the ladle of h≈´·πÉ is the worship of the seven with the ladle of the guru.

original: dgang gzar gyis gcig mchod pa ni dang po bla mas so ;
analyzed: dgang gzar gyis gcig mchod pa ni dang po bla mas so ;
translated: The worship of one with the ladle is the worship of the guru.

original: / brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'i //
analyzed: / brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'i //
translated: The imagined and the un-imagined

original: 'dzin pa 'dir ni mi bgyid do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa 'dir ni mi bgyid do //
translated: are not to be grasped here.

original: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi mchod pa 'di yang dag pa'i mchod pa la ngo bo dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi mchod pa 'di yang dag pa'i mchod pa la ngo bo dang bral ba ste /
translated: This is the offering of the fire sacrifice, which is also the offering of reality, free from essence.

original: gnas dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la sogs pa kun mi 'dzin zhes rgya cher sbyar ro //üîΩrang @181a * //
analyzed: gnas dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la sogs pa kun mi 'dzin zhes rgya cher sbyar ro // rang @181a * //
translated: The place, the ladle for pouring, the ladle for offering, and so on, are not grasped at all.üîΩOne should apply this extensively.

original: sems 'byung pos zos pa kun //
analyzed: sems 'byung pos zos pa kun //
translated: The self-mind is eaten by the bh≈´ta spirits.

original: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //
translated: I will teach the various methods.

original: zhes pa ni byang chub sems mi gnas par 'byung zhing rtog pa dang / mtshan ma la rgyu ba'i thabs kyi bye brag gis gzung bar gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub sems mi gnas par 'byung zhing rtog pa dang / mtshan ma la rgyu ba'i thabs kyi bye brag gis gzung bar gsungs so //
translated: This teaches that the non-abiding bodhicitta, which arises and moves in the signs of conceptuality, is to be grasped by the various methods.

original: don dam du ni phyi don mi //
analyzed: don dam du ni phyi don mi //
translated: In the ultimate, there is no external object.

original: nang gi ma yin phyi ma yin //
analyzed: nang gi ma yin phyi ma yin //
translated: It is not internal, nor external.

original: zhes gsungs te don dam pa de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg ni phyi yang ma yin /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te don dam pa de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg ni phyi yang ma yin /
translated: The fire sacrifice of ultimate reality is not external,

original: nang gi zas la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nang gi zas la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: nor is it internal, such as food and so on.

original: de bas na don dam du gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang ma yin pa 'di ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na don dam du gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang ma yin pa 'di ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the ultimate secret fire sacrifice is also not so. This is the nature of natural joy.

original: rdul med rnam par rdul med dag / ces pa ni rtog pa la sogs pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i rnam pa'i bag chags kyi rdul thams cad med par byas nas rang bzhin gyi gnas su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdul med rnam par rdul med dag / ces pa ni rtog pa la sogs pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i rnam pa'i bag chags kyi rdul thams cad med par byas nas rang bzhin gyi gnas su dag pa'o //
translated: The line free from dust, free from all dust means that, having eliminated all the habitual tendencies of the aspects of dust, such as thoughts, one is purified in one's natural state.

original: stong ba nyid ni stong min bral //
analyzed: stong ba nyid ni stong min bral //
translated: Emptiness is free from nonemptiness.

original: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i don gyis spros pa thabs dang bral pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i don gyis spros pa thabs dang bral pa ste /
translated: This means that, by the perfect meaning, one is free from the elaborations of method.

original: de yang rang bzhin gyis sbyin sreg 'di ni gzugs kyang ma yin /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyis sbyin sreg 'di ni gzugs kyang ma yin /
translated: Moreover, this natural fire offering is not form,

original: tshor ba la sogs pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa ma yin /
translated: not feeling, and so on,

original: dbang po yang ma yin /
analyzed: dbang po yang ma yin /
translated: not the faculties,

original: khams kyang ma yin /üîΩskye mched kyang ma yin /
analyzed: khams kyang ma yin / skye mched kyang ma yin /
translated: not the elements,üîΩnot the sense bases,

original: khams rnams kyang ma yin /
analyzed: khams rnams kyang ma yin /
translated: not the constituents,

original: shin tu stong pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: shin tu stong pa yang ma yin /
translated: not even utter emptiness,

original: stong pa chen po yang ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa chen po yang ma yin /
translated: not even great emptiness,

original: mi stong ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi stong ba yang ma yin /
translated: and not even nonemptiness.

original: brjod du med pa lkog tu gyur pa rang rig pa'i dngos dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: brjod du med pa lkog tu gyur pa rang rig pa'i dngos dang bral ba ste /
translated: It is inexpressible, hidden, and free from the entity of self-awareness.

original: rang rig pa las gzhan du 'da' ba ma yin pa 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg ces bshad do //
analyzed: rang rig pa las gzhan du 'da' ba ma yin pa 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg ces bshad do //
translated: This is the fire offering of reality.üîΩTherefore,üîΩThe aggregates and constituents are imagined,üîΩand what deity is offered?

original: de'i phyir / phung po khams ni rnam par rtog / lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig bsreg / de ni me yi don dam par //
analyzed: de'i phyir / phung po khams ni rnam par rtog / lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig bsreg / de ni me yi don dam par //

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dngos ma yin te sngar bstan pa bzhin no //

original: rta dang glang po la sogs pa ni slob dpon la sogs pa'i yon gnas la yon gyi rim pa phul bas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis don 'grub par bstan to ;
analyzed: rta dang glang po la sogs pa ni slob dpon la sogs pa'i yon gnas la yon gyi rim pa phul bas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis don 'grub par bstan to ;

analyzed: / rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u brgyad pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /

original: // / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
analyzed: // / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa bshad do //

translated: is an assembly because everything is assembled.

original: 'khor yang yin te lha dang lha mo dang bdud rtsi la sogs pas 'khor zhing khyab pa'i //

original: gtor ma chen po yin te phyi nang gi dbye bas ni gtor ma bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma chen po yin te phyi nang gi dbye bas ni gtor ma bya'o //

analyzed: nang du ni rtsa rnams kyi rim pa la mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //

original: gsang bar ni ye shes kyi tshogs bza' ba'i bdud rtsi dang srung ba'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs te /
analyzed: gsang bar ni ye shes kyi tshogs bza' ba'i bdud rtsi dang srung ba'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs te /
translated: The secret is the assembly of the am·πõta of the food of the accumulation of gnosis and the assembly of the am·πõta of protection.

original: de yang rgyu'i rim pas 'bras bu bza' ba dang / bsrung ba 'grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rgyu'i rim pas 'bras bu bza' ba dang / bsrung ba 'grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mchod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the result is accomplished by the sequence of causes, the feast and the protection, the worship of the nature of the Tathagatas, etc.

original: de kho na nyid ni bza' ba'i tshogs dang / bsrung ba gnyis ni bza' ba'i bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems kyi rtog pa dang bral ba'am /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni bza' ba'i tshogs dang / bsrung ba gnyis ni bza' ba'i bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems kyi rtog pa dang bral ba'am /

original: de bral pa'i dbang gis shes rab kyis srung rgyu med pa 'di ni rig pa dang bral ba'i dngos po gnyis su med pa'i tshogs spros pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba ste /

translated: This is the assembly of the non-dual entity free from awareness, free from all elaborations by nature.

original: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de kho na nyid 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de kho na nyid 'dus pa'o //
translated: The outer, inner, and secret, and the reality, are the assemblies.

original: de ni bde ba'i tshogs te ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: de ni bde ba'i tshogs te ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs so //
translated: That is the assembly of bliss, the assembly of the nature of intuition.

original: tshogs kyi dbye ba byas nas /
analyzed: tshogs kyi dbye ba byas nas /
translated: Having made the division of the assemblies,

original: khyim ni sum thog gi gnas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nyams dga' ba la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang / mu stegs dang chom rkun la sogs pa skyon spangs pa btsal lo //
analyzed: khyim ni sum thog gi gnas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nyams dga' ba la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang / mu stegs dang chom rkun la sogs pa skyon spangs pa btsal lo //
translated: The ‚Äúthree-storied house‚Äù is the place of one‚Äôs own delight, etc.

original: tshom rkun kun dang ldan pa yi //
analyzed: tshom rkun kun dang ldan pa yi //
translated: The king, the tƒ´rthikas, the thieves, etc., are to be sought, having been abandoned as faults.

original: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //
analyzed: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //
translated: Not outside, not inside,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: endowed with all the thieves.üîΩThe master is adorned with the assembly,

analyzed: slob dpon 'dus pas brgyan pa dang / zhes pa ni phyag rgya drug la sogs pa'i rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pas gnas pa'o //

original: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //

analyzed: zhes pas mnga' byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi gzugs so //
translated: the four consecrations are formed.

original: rdo rje skul sogs pas bskor //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje skul sogs pas bskor // zhes pa ni /
translated: Surrounded by the vajra whip, etc.,

original: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bskor dang / chogs dgram ba bya ba dang / kun sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa la rdo rje'i sgra ru bshad do //
analyzed: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bskor dang / chogs dgram ba bya ba dang / kun sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa la rdo rje'i sgra ru bshad do //
translated: surrounded by the five-colored thread, the arrangement of the assembly, the mantra of all, and endowed with samƒÅdhi, is explained as the sound of the vajra.

original: de lta bu yi khang mchog ni //
analyzed: de lta bu yi khang mchog ni //
translated: Such an excellent house,

original: zhes pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni go sla'o //
translated: is easy to understand.

original: @182a * // me tog la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
analyzed: @182a * // me tog la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
translated: One should make the mandala with flowers, etc.

original: zhes pa ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram me tog gi'am yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram me tog gi'am yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas bya'o //
translated: This means that one should make the mandala with colored powders, or with flowers, or else by the process of meditative concentration.

original: sna tshogs dang ni thams cad rdzogs //
analyzed: sna tshogs dang ni thams cad rdzogs //
translated: The various and complete.

original: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gang la yang rgyal dang / mchod pa dang / sgo dang / rdo rje ra ba yan lag rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gang la yang rgyal dang / mchod pa dang / sgo dang / rdo rje ra ba yan lag rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: This means that one should complete the limbs of the mandala, such as the victory banner, the offerings, the gates, and the vajra fence.

original: si la ga bur gyis ni mdzes //
analyzed: si la ga bur gyis ni mdzes //
translated: It is delightful with camphor.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i me tog la sogs bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i me tog la sogs bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa'o //
translated: This means that one should make the outer offerings of flowers, etc., and the mandala offerings.

original: des ni phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: des ni phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba'o //

original: de ru ma chod sbyin don du ni //
analyzed: de ru ma chod sbyin don du ni //

original: zhes pas ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dgod pa la bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes pas ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dgod pa la bya'o ;

original: / byol song gi ni rab gzugs blang //
analyzed: / byol song gi ni rab gzugs blang //
translated: One should take the form of the animal.

analyzed: zhes pa ni gti mug byol song gi ngo bo dang bral ba'i ro blang bar bya'o //
translated: This means that one should take the corpse that is free from the nature of the animal of delusion.

original: skye ba gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni bar ma chad par skyes pa na chod la bab pa'i ro blang zhes so //
analyzed: skye ba gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni bar ma chad par skyes pa na chod la bab pa'i ro blang zhes so //
translated: The one birth and so on means that when born without interruption, one should take the corpse that has fallen.

original: nad kun med pa bde grub pa //üîΩzhes pa ni dang mi bde ba dang bral ba'i dngos grub grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba de'o //üîΩdri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //
analyzed: nad kun med pa bde grub pa // zhes pa ni dang mi bde ba dang bral ba'i dngos grub grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba de'o // dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //
translated: The accomplishment of health and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being free from all illness and discomfort.

original: zhes pa ni dri la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis gang ba /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dri la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis gang ba /
translated: The arising of fragrant dust and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the qualities of smell and so on.

original: yang dag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyu ste bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyu ste bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The true nectar is the cause, which is the nature of bliss.

original: gang zhig mig ni yun rings 'dzums //
analyzed: gang zhig mig ni yun rings 'dzums //
translated: The one who smiles with the eyes for a long time and so on means that the wise one should take the nectar for the sake of the action that has the nature of wisdom.üîΩ The various sacrifices and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the assembly of many offerings to the assembly.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bya pa'i don du mkhas pas blangs zhes gsungs so //
translated: The suitable flaying knife and so on means that one should perform the action of cutting with a flaying knife that has the nature of wisdom and is very sharp.

original: sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //
translated: The various offerings and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the assembly of many offerings to the assembly.üîΩ The suitable flaying knife and so on means that one should perform the action of cutting with a flaying knife that has the nature of wisdom and is very sharp.

original: zhes pa ni tshogs la mchod pa mang po'i tshogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni tshogs la mchod pa mang po'i tshogs pas so //
translated: The various offerings and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the assembly of many offerings to the assembly.

original: gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
analyzed: gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
translated: The suitable flaying knife and so on means that one should perform the action of cutting with a flaying knife that has the nature of wisdom and is very sharp.üîΩ The various offerings and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the assembly of many offerings to the assembly.

original: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin shin tu rno ba'i gri gug gis bcad pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin shin tu rno ba'i gri gug gis bcad pa'i las bya'o //
translated: The suitable flaying knife and so on means that one should perform the action of cutting with a flaying knife that has the nature of wisdom and is very sharp.üîΩ The various offerings and so on means that one should accomplish the power of being filled with the assembly of many offerings to the assembly.üîΩ The suitable flaying knife and so on means that one should perform the action of cutting with a flaying knife that has the nature of wisdom and is very sharp.üîΩ The various offerings and so on means that one should accomplish the power of

original: yan lag rab kyi padmo'i snod //
analyzed: yan lag rab kyi padmo'i snod //
translated: The best part is the vessel of the lotus of the head.

original: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun //
analyzed: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun //
translated: For the sake of drinking, in front of the guru.

original: zhes pa ni rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa'i rab ni mgo bo'i padma'i snod do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa'i rab ni mgo bo'i padma'i snod do //
translated: The best part of the feet, hands, and so forth is the vessel of the lotus of the head.

original: de la ni ka p'a la byas la lha'i chang yang dag pas bkang ba las yang dag pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la ni ka p'a la byas la lha'i chang yang dag pas bkang ba las yang dag pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: There one should make a kapƒÅla filled with the genuine liquor of the gods, and it will become the genuine feast.

original: yang na ka p'a la ni tshogs kyi rtsa ba yin no //üîΩphyed ni 'khor la brim pa ste //
analyzed: yang na ka p'a la ni tshogs kyi rtsa ba yin no // phyed ni 'khor la brim pa ste //
translated: Or else, the kapƒÅla is the root of the feast.üîΩHalf is distributed to the retinue.

original: phyed ni gtor mar dbul bar bya //
analyzed: phyed ni gtor mar dbul bar bya //
translated: Half is to be offered as a bali.

original: zhes pa ni phyed mar sha dang chang la sogs pa bgo ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyed mar sha dang chang la sogs pa bgo ba'o //
translated: Half is the distribution of meat, liquor, and so forth.

original: gzhan yang de ltar sbyar ro //üîΩkhrag chen ni mi yi khrag go //
analyzed: gzhan yang de ltar sbyar ro // khrag chen ni mi yi khrag go //
translated: Moreover, it is to be applied in that way.üîΩGreat blood is human blood.

original: sha chen ni sha chen te mi'i sha'o //
analyzed: sha chen ni sha chen te mi'i sha'o //
translated: Great meat is human flesh.

original: @182b ji snyed pa ni brtag pa yin //
analyzed: @182b ji snyed pa ni brtag pa yin //
translated: As much as there is is the investigation.

original: zhes pa ni tshogs chang bshams la mchod pa'i rdzas gzhan ni sna tshogs mchod pa bye brag cas pa ni zas kyi rnam pa mi 'dra bas kyang mchod pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni tshogs chang bshams la mchod pa'i rdzas gzhan ni sna tshogs mchod pa bye brag cas pa ni zas kyi rnam pa mi 'dra bas kyang mchod pa'i bye brag go //
translated: This is the arrangement of the feast-offering. The other offering substances are the various offerings. The particular is the offering with various kinds of food.

original: nya dang sha la sogs par ldan //
analyzed: nya dang sha la sogs par ldan //
translated: Endowed with fish, meat, and so on.

original: zhes pa ni 'di rnams thams cad tshogs pa la ldan zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di rnams thams cad tshogs pa la ldan zhes bya'o ;
translated: This is all endowed with the assembly.

original: / mi 'tshe ba ni gzhan la gnod pa ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: / mi 'tshe ba ni gzhan la gnod pa ma byas pa'o //
translated: Non-violence is not harming others.

original: skyon kun bral zhes pa la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //üîΩde ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
analyzed: skyon kun bral zhes pa la sogs pa ni go bar zad do // de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
translated: Free from all faults, and so on, is self-evident.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa bza' ba'i dam tshig dang srung ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa bza' ba'i dam tshig dang srung ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: There, the pure commitments, and so on, are the commitments of eating, the commitments of protection, and so on, as explained above.

original: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim //
translated: The wheel and so on, the family, are satisfied.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / bla mar bcas pas mchod pas tshim par byas la phyed gtor ma'i nang du dbul lo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / bla mar bcas pas mchod pas tshim par byas la phyed gtor ma'i nang du dbul lo //
translated: The wheel and so on, the assembly, and the guru, are satisfied by the offering, and half is to be given to the inner sacrificial cake.

original: nam phyed lam gyi bzhi mdor ro //
analyzed: nam phyed lam gyi bzhi mdor ro //
translated: At midnight, in the crossroads.

original: yang na sum mdo gyes pa ru //
analyzed: yang na sum mdo gyes pa ru //
translated: Or at the crossroads of the four dakinis.

original: zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyu srang bzhi mdor gtor ma chen po gtang ba'am //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyu srang bzhi mdor gtor ma chen po gtang ba'am //
translated: This means that one should offer a great bali at the crossroads of the four dakinis,üîΩor at the crossroads of the three roads.

original: sum mdo ru gtang ba'o// dur khrod kyi ni chu ngos sam //
analyzed: sum mdo ru gtang ba'o// dur khrod kyi ni chu ngos sam //
translated: On the shore of the charnel ground,

original: zhes pas ni gnas bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pas ni gnas bstan te /
translated: This indicates the place.

original: rgya chen por sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgya chen por sbyar ro //
translated: It should be prepared on a vast scale.

original: lhag ma ma yin yang na phud //
analyzed: lhag ma ma yin yang na phud //
translated: The leftovers, or the first portion,

original: ces pa ni tshogs kyi lhag ma la sogs pas yi dgas rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir chus bsres la bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni tshogs kyi lhag ma la sogs pas yi dgas rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir chus bsres la bya'o //
translated: This means that one should mix the leftovers of the ganachakra and so forth with water in order to satisfy the hungry ghosts.üîΩAll the others should be set aside individually.

original: gzhan ma kun ni so sor gzhag / ces bya ba ni phyogs skyong bcu la gtor ma bcu so sor gzhag go //
analyzed: gzhan ma kun ni so sor gzhag / ces bya ba ni phyogs skyong bcu la gtor ma bcu so sor gzhag go //
translated: This means that the ten bali offerings for the ten direction protectors should be set aside individually.üîΩThe root bali should be set aside in order.

original: rtsa ba ci bzhin rim pas gzhag / ces bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gtor ma chen po mdun la gzhag / phyi ma yang rim pa bzhin du gzhag go //
analyzed: rtsa ba ci bzhin rim pas gzhag / ces bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gtor ma chen po mdun la gzhag / phyi ma yang rim pa bzhin du gzhag go //
translated: This means that the great root bali should be set aside in front, and the others in order.

original: rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely arriving at one's own place,üîΩThis means in the place of the great charnel ground,

original: zhes pa ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas sam /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas sam /
translated: This is the place of the great charnel ground.üîΩ

original: yang na chu dogs chen por phyin pa tsam ni man ngag go //
analyzed: yang na chu dogs chen por phyin pa tsam ni man ngag go //
translated: Or else, the great danger of water is just the instruction.

original: 'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag / ces bya ba ni 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad ni gcig tu btud par brtag go //
